title: New Moon in Sagittarius
summary: A reset point that seeds fresh vision in the Sagittarius realm: meaning, direction, and honest exploration. Intentions want to be named, not assumed.

meaning.headline: A clean slate to aim higher and clarify purpose under the Sagittarius New Moon.

frames.text: Today’s New Moon in Sagittarius invites a fresh aim toward meaning and honest growth.
Intentions land best when they’re grounded in your values, not borrowed narratives.
Curiosity, learning, or travel planning can anchor this reset.
Naming one next step keeps the optimism from drifting.
This guarantees a breakthrough or destiny shift.

frictions: Drifting into vague inspiration without action
opportunities: State one intention tied to a core value
Design a simple learning or travel plan
Share a vision with someone you trust for grounding
Balance optimism with a realistic checkpoint

do: Name the value behind your intention.
Outline one concrete action within 48 hours.
Invite a perspective that widens your aim.
Keep honesty kind; clarity doesn’t need to be cutting.
avoid: Saying yes to everything that sounds expansive
Turning optimism into pressure on others
Making fate claims about this lunation

forbidden_claims: Predictive statements about outcomes of the New Moon
Deterministic promises of success or travel
allowed_framing: Agency-based choices tied to a new lunar cycle
Contextual language about exploration and purpose
Emphasis on planning and grounded optimism
